nodes.bodyText: Very nice.  I'd almost prefer it to not be optional but I see why it needs to be.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -8,11 +8,23 @@ * Indicates that the method/class/etc marked maps to GitHub API in the preview period. *

* These APIs are subject to change and not a part of the backward compatibility commitment. Always used in conjunction - * with 'deprecated' to raise awareness to clients. + * with 'deprecated' to raise awareness to clients. In addition, it's advised to update the targets documentation to + * signify that the deprecation is required until preview feature being used is promoted to stable.
